about_the_game:
This is a 2d card survival game
  • Come to the primitive environment wilderness to survive alone, and survive here by collecting and crafting items.
  • Has a rich weather system sunny, cloudy, cloudy, light rain, moderate rain, heavy rain, heavy rain, heavy rain, typhoon, light snow, moderate snow, heavy snow, blizzard
  • The protagonist has attributes such as moisture, fullness, state of mind, energy, cold, heat, vomiting, diarrhea, poisoning, fever, protein, weight, etc.
  • Have a 24-hour time system, walk fast during the day, and walk slowly at night, making it easier to encounter wild animals.
  • Has a rich crafting system Axe, fire, shelter, spear, knife, house, kiln
  • Gridded map, gradually open the surrounding environment.
